posts.description: Computer Science and Design Technology department has requested these monitors to replace outdated displays in their computer labs. The current monitors lack the resolution and color accuracy required for advanced design software, programming environments, and multimedia applications.

details.asset_description: High-resolution display for vocational training in graphic design, video editing, and programming
details.detail_description: The Package and asset are completely fine, no damage

posts.description: Room 150 in need of a screen for teaching

details.relocate_description: Asset: 75 inch Screen HYOSUNG, Serial Number: S9876543210 relocated from Main Storage to Room 150 on 2/12/2024
details.detail_description: The Package and asset are completely fine, no damage

posts.description: Request a portable electric piano for teaching piano class

details.detail_description: The Piano comes with an electric piano, an adapter and a case

posts.description: The infrared stove cannot turn on, but it still receives electricity. Maintain at room 300 or bring it to the distributor, the information is inside the package

details.detail_description: The stove wire was burned, and replaced by a new wire. The stove function normally
